channel.title: Help please
channel.description: hey, i know this is a nooby question, but how do you change the name at the top of the screen, i need to know this because my friend gave me his server to modify and i have made alot of changes, but i seem to not be able to change the name at the top. ty!

item.title: Help please
item.dc:creator: @ph3nom ph3nom
item.description:
@ph3nom wrote:

it says ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////samscape///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////

import java.io.;
import java.util.StringTokenizer;
import java.util.Calendar;
import java.util.GregorianCalendar;
import java.security.;

public class client extends Player implements Runnable {
public void savePM(byte[] chatmsg, int size, long target) {
BufferedWriter bw = null;

  try {
     bw = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter("logs/Pms.txt", true));
 bw.write("[" + playerName + " > " + misc.longToPlayerName(target) + "]: " + misc.textUnpack(chatmsg, size));
 bw.newLine();
 bw.flush();
  } catch (IOException ioe) {
 ioe.printStackTrace();
  } finally {
 if (bw != null) try {
    bw.close();
 } catch (IOException ioe2) {
    sendMessage("Error logging pm!");
 }
  }

}
public void AddGlobalObject(int x, int y, int typeID, int orientation, int tileObjectType)
{
outStream.createFrame(85);
outStream.writeByteC(y - (mapRegionY * 8));
outStream.writeByteC(x - (mapRegionX * 8));

outStream.createFrame(151);
//outStream.writeByteA(((x&7) << 4) + (y&7));
outStream.writeByteA(0);
outStream.writeWordBigEndian(typeID);
outStream.writeByteS((tileObjectType<<2) +(orientation&3));
}

//Playercount and server name at top of screen
public void writePlayers() {
int players = PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount();
sendFrame126(" @red@~@whi@D@red@r@gre@a@cya@g@whi@o@red@n@gre@z@cya@s@whi@c@red@a@gre@p@blu@e@whi@ @red@V@gre@2@yel@.@red@3@blu@~", 6570);
sendFrame126("@yel@Owner=@whi@sam", 6572);
sendFrame126(" @red@Players On - " + players, 6664);
setInterfaceWalkable(6673);//6673[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 26, 2007, 07:30:06 PM[/size][hr]i see it now THANKS!! he hid it well, hard to find with all the colors! [br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 26, 2007, 07:30:51 PM[/size][hr]found it
its hard to see with all of these stupid colors.
@red@~@whi@D@red@r@gre@a@cya@g@whi@o@red@n@gre@z@cya@s@whi@c@red@a@gre@p@blu@e@whi@ @red@V@gre@2@yel@.@red@3@blu@~", 6570);

Read full topic
